title: Motion Infographics-Based Programming Skill-Up Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental programming concepts (variables, conditional statements, loops)
context.additional_context: Enhancing project execution and peer collaboration in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can enhance algorithm visualization skills by over 80% using motion infographics during programming problem-solving processes.

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
